name: Purge Day
description:
Purge day is a post-apocalyptic TPS survival horror game prototype.

 The action takes place in a secret military base that produces chemical weapons.

 You assume the role of Dani, a spy who had the mission to discover what kind of weapons are being created in this base. He discovers the terrifying experiments that were taking place at the base, but it was already too late.

 This game is a prototype. We aim to create such a game in the future, but for the moment we have created this prototype to find out your opinion about it.
